title: Extended pre-training of histopathology foundation models uncovers co-existing breast cancer archetypes characterized by RNA splicing or TGF-β dysregulation
details: LM Fournier, G Haefliger, AEP Vernhes, V Jung… - bioRxiv, 2025
abstract: In recent years, histopathology foundation models (hFM) have rapidly advanced in size and complexity, achieving excellent performance in tasks such as cancer diagnosis and biomarker discovery. Here, we reveal novel capabilities of these …
